GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.21 to before v4.14.296
GSD.description:
usb: mon: make mmapped memory read only

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.296 by commit b29f76fcf2db6615b416d98e28c7d81eff4c89a2, it was introduced in version v2.6.21 by commit 6f23ee1fefdc1f80bd8a3ab04a1c41ab2dec14c9. For more details please see the references link.
